## Documentation Issue

Which specific section or file needs improvement? Please provide the file path and/or section name.

```
e.g., crates/synesis-core/src/agents/pathos.rs
```

## Suggested Content

Please provide your suggestions for improving this documentation:

**Current content (if applicable):**
```markdown

```

**Suggested improvement:**
```markdown
Paste your suggested improvement here
```

## Type of Improvement

- [ ] Clarification - Existing content is unclear
- [ ] Missing Content - Information is completely missing
- [ ] Outdated Content - Information is no longer accurate
- [ ] Typo/Grammar - Minor text corrections
- [ ] Example Needed - Code example would help
- [ ] Better Organization - Structure/flow improvement

## Priority

- [ ] High - Blocks users from using the project
- [ ] Medium - Important for understanding
- [ ] Low - Nice to have

Add any other context or screenshots about the documentation issue.
